goal:
we are a Baha’i-inspired global learning community
that accompanies mindful individuals and groups
through daily work and discourse
to transform business and the economy
thereby contributing to a prosperous, just and sustainable civilisation

What do we do?
ebbf is present in over 50 countries and aims to accompany mindful individuals by connecting them with new ideas, tools and individuals spread around the world who are exploring and learning through action how to create more meaningful organizations and economic systems.

ebbf also offers seven key activities, over 300 events every year, more than 30 publications and knowledge centres.
